decision_schema.threat_indicators: array of strings (any concerning factors found)

session_schema.indicators: array of strings (reasons for the decision)

extraction_schema.extracted_fields: object with field names as keys and extracted values as strings or null
extraction_schema.confidence: object with field names as keys and confidence scores as numbers between 0 and 1

vision_schema.face_detected: boolean (true if there is a face)
vision_schema.dangerous_object_detected: boolean (true if any dangerous object is detected)
vision_schema.details: string (very short description of what do you see)
